IRS990.MissionDesc: PRODUCING POSITIVE CHANGE AND LASTING IMPACT, AND ENHANCING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS OF THE SOUTH MADISON COUNTY COMMUNITY BY ATTRACTING CHARITABLE GIFTS AND MAKING PHILANTHROPIC GIFTS IN RESPONSE TO COMMUNITY NEEDS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ADMINISTRATION OF GRANTS, SCHOLARHIPS, AND RELATED EXPENSES IN ACCORDANCE WITH DONOR RESTRICTIONS, AND/OR THE STATED PURPOSE OF ENDOWED FUNDS.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART II, SECTION B, LINE 10 - OTHER INCOME
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: COMPRISED OF ADMINISTRATIVE FEES, CHANGE IN PV OF SPLIT INTEREST AGREEMENTS, AND OTHER MISCELLANEOUS INCOME

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ESCROW LIABILITY ARRANGEMENT EXPLANATION - IN ACCORDANCE WITH FASB ASC-958-20-15, THE FOUNDATION REPORTS CONTRIBUTIONS AS A LIABILITY WHEN THIRD PARTY ORGANIZATIONS TRANSFER THESE ASSETS TO THE FOUNDATION AND SPECIFY THEMSELVES, R THEIR AFFILIATES, AS THE BENEFICIARY.

EXPLANATION FOR UNREPORTED CONTRIBUTIONS OR ASSETS IN ACCORDANCE WITH FASB ASC-958-20-15, THE FOUNDATION REPORTS CONTRIBUTIONS AS A LIABILITY WHEN THIRD PARTY ORGANIZATIONS TRANSFER THESE ASSETS TO THE FOUNDATION AND SPECIFY THEMSELVES, OR THEIR AFFILIATES, AS THE BENEFICIARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. IT IS REVIEWED FOR ACCURACY AND IF ANY POTENTIAL DISCREPANCIES ARE NOTED, THEY DIRECT THEM TO THE BOARD PRESIDENT AND TREASURER. THEY, WHEN SATISFIED WITH ANY POTENTIAL CHANGES OR ADJUSTMENTS, AUTHORIZE THE SUBMISSION (FILING) OF THE FORM BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICTS OF INTEREST STATEMENTS ARE SIGNED ANNUALLY BY ALL BOARD MEMBERSAND STAFF, AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO ABSTAIN FROM VOTING ON ANYISSUES IN WHICH THEY HAVE OR MAY APPEAR TO HAVE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST TO BE REVIEWED AT THE SOUTH MADISON COMMUNITY FOUNDATION OFFICE, LOCATED AT 233 S. MAIN ST., PENDLETON, IN 46064.
